Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: I9-10850k | GPU: RTX 3090 | RAM: 32gb 3200mhz DDR4

 

I created a simple 3 stage rocket.  And saved it

 

I then saved it again accidentally.  And then merged the two workspaces together to get rid of the duplicate workspace 

 

Next time I played, every part of the ship was doubled up, so you could click on the engine, drag it away, and another engine that didn't show up in the stages was there

 

I deleted the double parts, and saved the ship again, expecting it to now be good, but the rocket was deleted, there is no workspace or ship for it anymore 

 

Edited July 10, 2023 by Anth12
